steps.description: Sift flour, mix with salt and sugar, beaten egg, add liquids and collect the mass into a single whole. Sprinkle a table or cutting board with flour, grease your hands with oil, put it out of the bowl, knead. Wrap in cling film or a damp towel and set aside for 15 minutes.
Cut sausages and salami into slices. Chop the onion and fry in a minimum amount of oil.
Roll out the dough to a thickness of 3 mm, thinly distribute the sauce, then the filling. Top with mozzarella.

Combine wheat flour with salt, yeast, sugar, vegetable oil. Slowly adding water, knead the dough from the products in a convenient way: by hand, in a food processor, with a hand mixer with screw nozzles.
Cover the bowl with a towel and let it rest for 30-40 minutes.
With oily hands, pull out a cake with a diameter of 40 cm. Plastic dough easily takes any shape. Grease a baking sheet thickly with a piece of butter, lay the circle.
Distribute the sauce, filling, sprinkle with cheese. Send for 15 minutes in the oven. Cut the finished pizza with a roller cutter and taste it immediately.

Dissolve the yeast, combine with the rest of the ingredients, mix. Put it on the table and knead a smooth elastic dough. If it sticks to the countertop or stretches like chewing gum, add 1-2 tablespoons of flour, send it to 'rest' for 40 minutes.
To prepare the sauce, put out the cream, garlic, butter, flour in a frying pan, combine with dry herbs, olive oil, a pinch of salt.
Knead the dough well, roll out a circle 5 mm thick, put the sauce, filling, sliced olives, cheese. Serve with fresh basil leaves.
